description: I am a spring 2013 AM class member.  I love doing anything outdoors and hanging out with the guys.  I love seeking out leadership opportunities and always look for ways to give back to the Greek community and especially Lambda Chi Alpha.
aspects: I love the diversity of the fraternity.  There are always guys you find share similar interests and ideals but the fraternity isn't cookie cutter.  I feel this allows all of us to learn from and better each other.
name: Jordan Cain
